title: Map of Trade and Extent of Islam - connection

content.question: Based on the map, which of the following best explains the adoption of Islam by the Swahili city-states?

choices.label: The establishment of trade with China
The conversion of Shona kingdoms to Islam
Missionary efforts of West African Muslims
Regular contact with Muslim merchants from other regions

content.answer: Regular contact with Muslim merchants from other regions

topic.text: 1.8: Culture and Trade in Southern and East Africa

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
